amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used for the Southwestern Pennsylvania Heritage Preservation Commission in Hollidaysburg, Pennsylvania; the Westsylvania Heritage Corporation in Hollidaysburg, Pennsylvania; and the Progress Fund in Greensburg, Pennsylvania.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A046) Failed by recorded vote: 86 - 343 (Roll no. 569).
